node.title: Anthony Dirrell knocks out Marcos Hernandez with a windmill uppercut.
node.alt: Anthony Dirrell celebrates after defeating Marcos Hernandez.
node.description: Dirrell said he hoped to face the winner of the main event in his next fight.
node.content: ["It\u2019s tough to tell which Anthony Dirrell feat was more impressive.", "Four rounds into his co-main event bout against Marcos Hernandez, Dirrell, a former super middleweight world champion, landed a bolo punch uppercut to Hernandez\u2019s jaw. Dirrell, a 37-year-old from Flint, Mich., windmilled his right arm like a softball pitcher, and the impact of the punch snapped Hernandez\u2019s head back before sending him to the canvas.", "Seconds after the referee waved the fight off, Dirrell celebrated with a midring backflip.", "And stuck the landing.", "Dirrell, who dressed in Michigan State Spartan green and white, improved his record to 34-2-2. Earlier this week, he said he hoped to face the winner of the main event in his next fight."]
